code: import{call,put,takeEvery}from"redux-saga/effects";import{getLogs}from"../../../apis/logs";import{fetchLogsSuccess,fetchLogsFail}from"./actions";import{GET_LOGS_START}from"./actionTypes";import{showErrorNotification}from"../notifications/actions";function fetchLogs(_ref){let{payload}=_ref;return function*(){try{const data=yield call(getLogs,payload);const{result,status}=data;if(status){yield put(fetchLogsSuccess(result));}}catch(error){yield put(fetchLogsFail(error));yield put(showErrorNotification(error.message));}}();}function*logsSaga(){yield takeEvery(GET_LOGS_START,fetchLogs);}export default logsSaga;
